body.name: Nordic Naturals Vitamin D3 Gummies, Wild Berry - 60 Gummies - 1000 IU Vitamin D3 - Great Taste - Healthy Bones, Mood & Immune System Function - Non-GMO - 60 Servings
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 5 hrs 17 mins
features: WHY VITAMIN D3 - Vitamin D plays an important role in building strong bones, and helping to regulate levels of calcium & phosphorus. Vitamin D3 also supports the normal functioning of the immune system, and may support a healthy mood.

DELICIOUS & CONVENIENT - Our vegetarian, gelatin-free Vitamin D3 Gummies for adults are a delicious, convenient way to get your expert-recommended daily vitamin D3—the form of vitamin D your body naturally makes from sunlight.

BETTER ABSORPTION - Each great-tasting, chewable Vitamin D3 gummy provides 1000 IU (25 mcg) of cholecalciferol, the natural, most easily absorbed and utilized form of vitamin D. Vitamin D3 Gummies have a great wild berry flavor.

PURITY GUARANTEED - Everything we make is third-party tested, surpassing the strictest international standards for purity & freshness. This product is non-GMO, gluten & dairy free, and contains no artificial colors, flavors, or preservatives.

ETHICAL INNOVATION - Nordic Naturals has always been at the forefront of sustainable & ethical practices in the natural products industry. Through science & innovation, we are committed to delivering safe, effective nutrients for optimal wellness.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: D-lightful Gummies Sunshine Year-Round We need vitamin D for strong bones, robust immune function, and a balanced mood.* But with long hours indoors and low sunlight in the winter months, it’s easy to run low on the sunshine vitamin. Nordic Naturals vitamin D3 gummies deliver a replenishing dose of highly absorbable vitamin D3 in one easy, delicious serving. Choose from a variety of flavors and potencies for an extra boost of sunshine whenever it’s needed.

Easy and Enjoyable • Essential support for bones, immunity, and mood* • Convenient chewables with just one gummy per serving • Better absorption with bioactive vitamin D3 • Delicious gummies in wild berry • Vegetarian & non-GMO with low or zero sugar options

Vitamin D3 Gummies at a Glance Vitamin D3 Gummies Zero Sugar Vitamin D3 Gummies Vitamin D3 5000 Gummies About the Formula Daily dose of vitamin D3 in one tasty gummy for bone and immune support.* About the Formula Daily dose of vitamin D3 in one tasty gummy with zero grams of sugar.* About the Formula High potency vitamin D3 gummies to help replenish depleted levels.* Key Ingredients Vitamin D3 Key Ingredients Vitamin D3 Key Ingredients Vitamin D3 Potency 1000 IU Potency 1000 IU Potency 5000 IU Format Gummies Format Gummies Format Gummies Available Flavors Wild Berry Available Flavors Wild Berry Available Flavors Passion Fruit

Does Nordic Naturals use independent labs for testing their products? Yes. We use ISO-accredited (or similar) third-party laboratories to independently verify our ingredients on all important measures of safety and quality, including freshness, purity, stability, potency, and the accuracy of dosage claims. Will I get fishy burps? Repeat burping or bad taste could mean your supplement may be oxidized. All Nordic Naturals fish oils are protected from exposure to oxygen at every step of production to help deliver an exceptionally fresh taste without fishy burps or aftertaste. Are there options for me if I have a hard time swallowing pills? Yes. We offer liquid options for many of our fish oil products, and our fish oil soft gels are chewable for those who have difficulty swallowing pills. Some products are also available in smaller, easier-to-swallow mini soft gels or chewable gummies. Are allergens present in Nordic Naturals products? We use FDA-compliant allergen labeling, and disclose any warnings relating to allergen exposure on our product labels. We recommend that consumers discuss product ingredients with a health care professional for any potential allergen concerns.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These Vitamin D gummies have been an absolute game-changer for my daily supplement routine! The taste is delicious, making it so easy to take them every day, unlike traditional pills. The gummies makes me looking forward to my daily dose of Vitamin D. Since switching to these gummies, I haven't missed a single day of taking my Vitamin D supplement.Not only are they enjoyable to consume, but they are also highly effective. I've noticed a significant improvement in my overall well-being since incorporating these gummies into my daily routine. It's great to know that I'm getting the necessary dosage of Vitamin D without any hassle or discomfort. If you're looking for a tasty and convenient way to meet your Vitamin D needs, these gummies are an absolute winner!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These gummies taste so good. My Vitamin D levels have been in the normal range ever since I started eating them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good for your bone health
reviews.reviewText: As advertised, fast delivery, taste great & work really well

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Delicious taste, great texture. High quality product
reviews.reviewText: These gummies have a delicious taste and a great gummy texture. Nordic Naturals is a very high quality brand and this product didn’t disappoint. It is significantly better then other vitamin D gummies I have purchased.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good quality ok taste
reviews.reviewText: The taste isn’t bad at all, just a bit sweet for my taste. I prefer a more tart flavor. I continue to purchase because the quality is good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fixed my Deficiency
reviews.reviewText: I took two gummies a day for 4 months and I went from 25 ng/ml to 43 ng/ml! I had trouble finding a Vitamin D that I didn’t mind taking daily, but these are delicious and worked!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I don’t enjoy cold weather and go outside much less in the wintertime. Hence, low levels of vitamin D. These chewables are helpful through winter. I can’t take them at night because they give me energy, but mornings or noon work great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Vitamin D
reviews.reviewText: My doctor said take 1000 mg if vitamin D during these shorter sun days. I struggle with my moods during the winter. I’ve tried many other vitamin D supplements to help my mood but Nortic gummy has lifted my mood in just four days of use. Thank you for this great vitamin
